# Sirius XM Love

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Jump to navigation Jump to search

[Sirius XM](/wiki/Sirius_XM "Sirius XM") Love [![Sirius XM Love
logo.svg](//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/2/28/Sirius_XM_Love_logo.svg/220px-
Sirius_XM_Love_logo.svg.png)](/wiki/File:Sirius_XM_Love_logo.svg)  
---  
Broadcast area|  [United States](/wiki/United_States "United States")  
[Canada](/wiki/Canada "Canada")  
[Frequency](/wiki/Frequency "Frequency")|  [Sirius XM
Radio](/wiki/Sirius_XM_Radio "Sirius XM Radio") 70  
[Dish Network](/wiki/Dish_Network "Dish Network") 6070  
First air date|  November 12, 2008  
[Format](/wiki/Radio_format "Radio format")|  [Soft AC](/wiki/Soft_AC "Soft
AC")/[Love songs](/wiki/Love_song "Love song")  
[Class](/wiki/List_of_North_American_broadcast_station_classes "List of North
American broadcast station classes")|  [Satellite Radio](/wiki/Satellite_Radio
"Satellite Radio") Station  
Owner|  [Sirius XM Radio](/wiki/Sirius_XM_Radio "Sirius XM Radio")  
Website|  [SiriusXM Love](http://www.siriusxm.com/siriusxmlove)  
  
**[Sirius XM](/wiki/Sirius_XM "Sirius XM") Love**[1] is a music channel that
plays [love songs](/wiki/Love_song "Love song") from [soft-
AC](/wiki/Adult_contemporary_music#soft_adult_contemporary "Adult contemporary
music") artists and airs on [Sirius XM Radio](/wiki/Sirius_XM_Radio "Sirius XM
Radio"), and [Dish Network](/wiki/Dish_Network "Dish Network"). It airs on
channel 70 on Sirius XM Radio. On XM, it replaced former channel [The
Heart](/wiki/Heart_\(radio_network\) "Heart \(radio network\)") on November
12, 2008. On [Sirius XM Canada](/wiki/Sirius_XM_Canada "Sirius XM Canada"),
the channel retained the old Sirius Love name, Until February 9,
[2010](/wiki/2010_in_radio "2010 in radio"), Sirius XM Love was on
[DirecTV](/wiki/DirecTV "DirecTV") channel 819, but all of the [Sirius
XM](/wiki/Sirius_XM "Sirius XM") programming was dropped in favor of [Sonic
Tap](/wiki/Sonic_Tap "Sonic Tap").

From 2009-2014, Sirius XM Love was pre-empted annually during the [Christmas
season](/wiki/Christmas_season "Christmas season") and replaced with "Holly,"
a seasonal format devoted to contemporary pop [Christmas
music](/wiki/Christmas_music "Christmas music"). This format change typically
occurred during the first two weeks of November and continued until the end of
the year. (Holly is also available year-round through Sirius XM's online
service.) From 2015-2016, Holly pre-empted Sirius XM's **Velvet** instead,
allowing Sirius XM Love to retain its normal format through December, In 2016,
Holly will once again pre-empt SiriusXM Love.

On May 22, 2015, Sirius XM Love became a limited-run James Taylor Channel.
Later, it was the home of Yacht Rock.[2][3]

On August 17, 2017, SiriusXM Love moved to channel 70 and was replaced by
[PopRocks](/wiki/PopRocks_\(Sirius_XM\) "PopRocks \(Sirius XM\)") on Channel
17.[4]

## Selected artists
played[[edit](/w/index.php?title=Sirius_XM_Love&action=edit&section=1 "Edit
section: Selected artists played")]

[Gloria Estefan](/wiki/Gloria_Estefan "Gloria Estefan"), [Luther
Vandross](/wiki/Luther_Vandross "Luther Vandross"), [Bryan
Adams](/wiki/Bryan_Adams "Bryan Adams"), [Mariah Carey](/wiki/Mariah_Carey
"Mariah Carey"), [Kenny G](/wiki/Kenny_G "Kenny G"), [Barry
Manilow](/wiki/Barry_Manilow "Barry Manilow"), [Kelly
Clarkson](/wiki/Kelly_Clarkson "Kelly Clarkson"), [Bette
Midler](/wiki/Bette_Midler "Bette Midler"), [Lionel
Richie](/wiki/Lionel_Richie "Lionel Richie"), [Pink](/wiki/Pink_\(singer\)
"Pink \(singer\)")

  3. **Jump up ^** Williams, Stephen. ["Yacht Rock Radio returns for the summer!"](http://blog.siriusxm.com/2017/06/21/yacht-rock-radio-returns-for-the-summer/). _blog.siriusxm.com_. Sirius XM BLog. Retrieved 21 June 2017.
  4. **Jump up ^** Venta, Lance (August 16, 2017). ["SiriusXM Launches Two New Music Channels"](https://radioinsight.com/headlines/119313/siriusxm-launches-two-new-music-channels/). Retrieved August 16, 2017.

qa.question: what channel is the love station on sirius

m.09dbjg_1.Query Analysis: The query is asking for the specific channel number on Sirius where 'The Love Station' can be found.
m.09dbjg_1.Answer Analysis: The answer indicates that 'The Love Station' is on channel 70 on Sirius.
m.09dbjg_1.Document Content Analysis: The document provides information about Aghapy TV, a Coptic Christian TV station. It details its broadcasting locations, history, and satellite systems it uses, such as Spiritcast, Galaxy West, Galaxy 25, Dish Network 775, Optus D2, and Telstar 12. It also mentions its availability on various digital channels via UBI World TV.
m.09dbjg_1.Document and Query Keywords Matching: The document does not contain any of the query keywords 'channel', 'love station', or 'sirius'.
m.09dbjg_1.Document and Answer Keywords Matching: The document does not contain the keyword 'channel 70' or any reference to Sirius channels.
m.09dbjg_1.Key Information Matching: There is no key information in the document that matches the query or the answer. The document is about a different TV station and does not mention Sirius or 'The Love Station'.
m.09dbjg_1.Can the Document Answer the Query: No, the document does not provide any information about 'The Love Station' or its channel on Sirius.
m.09dbjg_1.Can the Document Help Infer Additional I: No, the document does not contain any relevant information that could help infer the channel number of 'The Love Station' on Sirius.
m.09dbjg_1.Explanation: The document is entirely unrelated to the query. It discusses Aghapy TV, a different television station, and does not mention Sirius or 'The Love Station'. Therefore, it cannot provide any useful context or additional information to answer the query.

m.01gbbz_28.Explanation: The document is entirely unrelated to the query. It focuses on Ellen DeGeneres and her career, which does not provide any useful context or information about Sirius radio channels or 'The Love Station'. Therefore, it is deemed irrelevant.

m.0295r_1626.Answer Analysis: The answer indicates that 'The Love Station' is on channel 70.

It mentions specific radio programs like 'Forfra med Jeppesen' and 'This Is Love', but does not provide channel information.
m.0295r_1626.Document and Query Keywords Matching: The document does not contain the keywords 'channel', 'love station', or 'sirius'.
